metadata.synopsis: A geologist (Grant Williams) and a schoolteacher (Lola Albright) evacuate a desert town attacked by thirsty giant crystals.
metadata.genre: Art House & International/Horror/Mystery & Suspense/Science Fiction & Fantasy

reviews: For genre buffs, climate change advocates and science junkies, The Monolith Monsters is a pitifully overlooked classic.
Probably one of the most misleading movie titles in film history . . .
One of the few monster movies you'll see where you feel nothing whatsoever towards the monster
